app.title: Canva: AI Photo & Video Editor
app.description:
Canva is your free photo editor, logo maker, collage maker, and video editor in one editing app! Design digital art faster with powerful magic AI tools built-in, like the AI image generator that allows you to transform text to image in just a few minutes Make stunning social media posts and reels, presentations or flyers, create logos, CVs, photo collages and video collages from customizable templates. 

Edit photos & design anything with the AI art generatorüñåÔ∏è: Video editor, collage maker, meme maker, CV maker & logo maker ‚Äì Canva is a simple & easy content creation app for anyone! üé® 

Canva features: AI art generator, photo editor and video maker
‚Ä¢ Facebook posts, Instagram layout designs, banner maker, Instagram post-maker & Instagram reels maker. 
‚Ä¢ Professional invitation maker, flyers & resume templates.
‚Ä¢ Display data with templates, presentations & slideshow maker.

AI EDITING APP üì∑ ‚Äì free, no ads, no watermarks
‚Ä¢ Image editor to crop, flip, & edit photos. Background eraser and blur editor. 
‚Ä¢ Picture editor to adjust brightness, contrast, saturation, etc.
‚Ä¢ Auto Focus to sharpen photo subject & blur background.
‚Ä¢ Add text to photos in the picture editor.
‚Ä¢ Use the photo grid, photo filters, photo layout & photo collage maker to create digital art.

AI VIDEO EDITOR üé• ‚Äì create videos in a few taps
‚Ä¢ Produce professional videos in the video editor with 5GB of cloud storage and real time collaboration.
‚Ä¢ Explore video layout & audio tracks in the video maker.
‚Ä¢ Crop, resize, and flip videos & images in the video editor.
‚Ä¢ Easy video editing: Make images move with one-tap animations & page transitions in the video maker.
‚Ä¢ Apply effects like slow motion and reverse playback, add subtitles to a video collage, or a new background to your green screen video. 
‚Ä¢ Magically sync edits to music with Beat Sync, for quick video editing
‚Ä¢ Automatically translate captions to over 100 languages
‚Ä¢ Add your favorite music tracks via Popular music* (regional restrictions apply)

SOCIAL MEDIA üì± ‚Äì make and match trendy content & graphic designs
‚Ä¢ Design for Instagram, Snapchat, Facebook, YouTube or LinkedIn.
‚Ä¢ Plan posts with Scheduler [Canva Pro].
‚Ä¢ Use our banner maker for thumbnails & ads.
‚Ä¢ Collage maker, picture editor & video maker to create photo grids & collages.

FREE CONTENT LIBRARY ‚Äì over 2M+ assets
‚Ä¢ 2M+ royalty-free images & photo filters
‚Ä¢ Thousands of watermark-free videos to use in the video editor
‚Ä¢ 25K+ pre-licensed audio & music tracks
‚Ä¢ Add text on pictures in the photo editor with 500+ fonts & effects
‚Ä¢ Or create your own images with our magic Text to Image tool

AI MAGIC BUILT-IN ‚ú® ‚Äì Bringing magic and ease of use to your designs 
We‚Äôve supercharged design across the Visual Suite with incredible magical AI-powered capabilities. Including;
‚Ä¢ Magic Design - Upload an image and let Canva make designs for you
‚Ä¢ Magic Edit - Swap, or add anything to your existing images
‚Ä¢ Translate - Automatically translate designs in 100+ languages
‚Ä¢ Magic Eraser - Remove objects from any image. 

CANVA PRO ‚Äì The editing app to boost your graphic design
‚Ä¢ Access premium templates, images, videos, logo maker, audio & graphic design elements + create stunning videos in the video editor
‚Ä¢ One-click Background Remover & Magic Resize for photos and videos
‚Ä¢ Brand Hub - Create logos with the logo maker, fonts, & colors
‚Ä¢ Schedule posts for Instagram & Facebook

GRAPHIC DESIGN FOR EVERYONE üé®
‚Ä¢ Personal - Layout designs for Instagram templates, resumes, photo editor, photo collages, logo maker, video editor, etc.
‚Ä¢ Entrepreneurs - Grow your business with our logo maker, video editor, poster maker & Magic Presentations.
‚Ä¢ Students & teachers - Engage with presentations & worksheets
‚Ä¢ Social Media Managers & Content Creators - Use the photo editor, logo maker, collage maker & video editor for brand visuals & mood boards

app.summary: All-in-One art, logo & collage maker. Design photos and edit video backgrounds

reviews.text: Pretty great app so far! I've only used it for a day, but I love being able to browse templates that have really nice HD thumbnails and save them into lists for different ideas or use cases for this platform, instead of using Photoshop or Illustrator templates. The time saved is insane, and the templates are still beautiful and customizable to make them unique. Although I have some pain points: there is heavy branding used throughout the code, and i think its got some broke filters.

The app's great, it's a good looking and running app. It's gets the job done,but it has some missing elements. Like, how can I not flip text,I just discovered that U can't flip text,just elements,pls fix. Plus,if it's not much, make the transparent background free,pls, that's all I ask. It's gonna save a lot of people out there....

Canva is an incredibly user-friendly and powerful design platform that has revolutionized the way I create visual content. Its intuitive drag-and-drop interface makes it easy for anyone to create professional-looking graphics, regardless of their design experience. The vast library of pre-made templates and customization options allows for endless creativity, and the collaboration features make it seamless to work with teams and clients. I've been able to create stunning social media graphics, p

As someone who's often felt that creating art was outside my wheelhouse (I'm very left-brained), I can honestly say that Canva has provided me with a type of creative outlet I've never had before, in a way that is easily adaptable to whatever my focus level is for whatever project I'm working on. And kudos to Canva for keeping your foot on the gas this past year. I had been on and off with my subscription, if a project came up, but now I seem to keep conveniently forgetting to turn it off. ^.^

I really love this app especially for designing projects and presentations but could I please recommend having an option on the search filter for elements or design? I want an option where you could either pick free or pro elements to show up. this way I wouldn't have to keep scrolling and scrolling which is going to be a waste of time to find free elements to add to my designs. please consider my request because it would be really really helpful for me. thank you.

Good great app for graphics and video. I will rate this app 5 star if text have solid color just like elements. I want to be able to give my text two or more different colors.. the team should make it possible for one to use two or even all the text effects on a text at once. I notice that if I apply stroke effect to my text, I will no longer be able to apply Shadow effect unless I deactivate the stroke effect. same thing applies to elements and images. consider in your next update please ü•∫
reviews.replyText: Hello there, thanks for the feedback and for using Canva. Make your text pop, and add more impact to your designs using text effects. Please refer to this link for more info: bit.ly/3xIekDn. Kindly update your app to enjoy its full features and improvements. For concerns, let us know at canva.me/android. Regards. - Lily

reviews.text: been using the app for yrs - but for some reason mp4s are not saving to my phone correctly. playback is fine before saving, but once a design is saved with animated words or graphics, they shift on their own/words overlap randomly. the app is fully updated, restarted my phone - something is messing up between app to saving to phone. saving at highest option as well.

This is absolutely good for anyone who wants to do creative works. This had multiple features other than just editing. It would be easy and helpful for anyone to do a quick presentation, poster or video. But sometimes some Songs you want to include might be copyrighted.
reviews.replyText: Hello Puwaneshwary, massive thanks for all the support and for using Canva. You inspire us to improve further because we believe designing should be easy and fun. We‚Äôve got more in store for you, kindly stay tuned for new features and improvements. If you have any concerns, reach us at canva.me/android. Regards. - Abby

reviews.text: Although Canva is an excellent tool for quick and simple design, there are a few places where the user experience might be more seamless. It can be difficult to navigate intricate patterns with many layers, for instance. It would be fantastic to see better layer management, maybe with more user-friendly grouping choices or nested folders. Furthermore, the search feature in templates needs improvement. Sometimes scrolling too much is necessary to find certain elements or styles.

Unusable. I spend hours trying to upload my video clips to canva. Uninstalling and reinstalling. Uploading to Google, download to my laptop, to try to upload to canva. Trying on multiple devices and it still fails.Considering using canva pro for video editing, don't. It's infuriating, time-consuming. I will be canceling and taking my business elsewhere. Support has no suggestions, doesn't bother to read what I've already Eventually 1 clip loads. It's not incompatible. It's a poorly made system.
reviews.replyText: Hi ChantalAlexis, thank you for reaching out to Canva. We're sorry to hear that you‚Äôre still having troubles uploading your designs. Your concern requires further investigation for us to come up with a resolution. We recommend sending us a report at canva.me/android and our support specialists will get back to you the soonest possible time. - Cynch

app.developerLegalAddress: SUITE 2 LEVEL 25, 100 MILLER STREET, NORTH SYDNEY NSW 2060, Australia
app.AIReview:
Canva: AI Photo & Video Editor - A Comprehensive Review

Overview

Canva: AI Photo & Video Editor has rapidly ascended to become one of the most popular design tools available, boasting over 553 million installs and a stellar average rating of 4.8 stars. This mobile application offers a surprisingly comprehensive suite of creative capabilities, aiming to democratize graphic design by providing user-friendly templates, intuitive editing features, and now, integrated AI tools. Designed for both novice and experienced creatives, Canva‚Äôs core mission is to empower users to quickly produce stunning visuals for social media, marketing materials, personal projects, and more - all without needing advanced design skills or expensive software subscriptions. The app's free tier provides a substantial amount of functionality, making it an attractive entry point for anyone looking to explore the world of visual content creation.

Key Features

Canva‚Äôs feature set is incredibly robust, reflecting its ambition to be a true all-in-one design solution. Some of the most notable features include:

  • AI Image Generator: This is arguably Canva's headline feature and leverages AI technology (likely utilizing diffusion models) to transform text prompts into unique images. Users input a description ‚Äì for example, ‚Äúa futuristic cityscape at sunset‚Äù - and the AI generates several image variations within seconds.
  • Extensive Template Library: The app offers a vast collection of professionally designed templates categorized by industry, purpose (social media posts, presentations, flyers), and style. Templates are the foundation of Canva‚Äôs ease-of-use; users simply select one and begin customizing.
  • Photo Editing Tools: Beyond AI generation, users have access to traditional photo editing tools like cropping, resizing, filters, brightness/contrast adjustments, color correction, and adding text overlays.
  • Video Editor: Canva‚Äôs video editor allows for creating short-form videos optimized for platforms like TikTok and Instagram Reels. It features pre-made templates, transitions, music library integration, and basic editing controls.
  • Collage Maker: A straightforward tool to create visually appealing photo collages with various layout options and customizable borders.
  • Brand Kit: Users can save brand assets (logos, fonts, colors) for consistent branding across their designs.
  • Magic Edit: This feature uses AI to replace elements within an image ‚Äì such as changing the background or removing unwanted objects ‚Äì with surprising effectiveness.

Strengths

Several key factors contribute to Canva‚Äôs success:

  • Ease of Use: The intuitive drag-and-drop interface and pre-designed templates make Canva remarkably accessible, even for complete beginners. There's a low barrier to entry.
  • Powerful AI Integration: The AI image generator is genuinely impressive in its speed and the quality of the images it produces. It significantly accelerates the design process.
  • Versatile Functionality: The app‚Äôs ability to handle photo editing, video creation, logo design, and collage making within a single platform is a major advantage.
  • Large Community & Resources: Canva's massive user base provides access to tutorials, templates, and inspiration, fostering a supportive learning environment.
  • Regular Updates: The developers consistently add new features, templates, and improvements, keeping the app fresh and relevant.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Canva isn‚Äôt without areas needing refinement:

  • AI Image Generator Limitations: While impressive, the AI image generator still occasionally produces outputs that are inconsistent or lack detail. The prompt engineering aspect can be tricky; users need to learn how to phrase their requests effectively for optimal results.
  • Template Overload: The sheer volume of templates can feel overwhelming at times. A more refined filtering system based on user needs would be beneficial.
  • Advanced Editing Features Missing: Compared to professional design software like Adobe Photoshop or Illustrator, Canva lacks some advanced features such as layer masking and complex vector editing capabilities.
  • Watermark (Free Tier): The presence of a watermark on designs created with the free tier can detract from the professionalism of certain projects ‚Äì especially for commercial use.

User Experience

The user experience in Canva is generally excellent. The interface is clean, well-organized, and responsive. Navigation is intuitive, allowing users to quickly find what they need. The drag-and-drop functionality is seamless, and the preview feature lets you see how your design will look before downloading or sharing. The app's performance is consistently smooth across a range of devices. However, during periods of high usage (particularly when utilizing the AI generator), the application can occasionally exhibit slight lag.

Value for Money

Canva‚Äôs pricing structure offers exceptional value. The free tier provides access to a substantial amount of templates and features, making it a fantastic option for casual users or those just starting out. The Pro subscription unlocks additional features like premium templates, unlimited AI image generations (currently capped at 100), brand kit functionality, and the ability to remove watermarks ‚Äì offering significant benefits for serious creators and businesses.

Conclusion

Canva: AI Photo & Video Editor is a powerful and remarkably user-friendly design tool that has earned its place as a leading mobile app in the art & design category. The integration of AI image generation elevates its capabilities, making it accessible to an even broader audience. While not without limitations (particularly regarding advanced editing features), Canva‚Äôs ease of use, versatility, and strong community support make it a worthwhile download for anyone looking to create visually appealing content ‚Äì regardless of their design experience level. The free tier is exceptionally generous, and the Pro subscription offers compelling value for those seeking more professional capabilities. The app's continued development and focus on AI innovation position it as a key player in the future of mobile design.
